Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component

Class CalibreComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aecsocket.calibre.item.CalibreItem
      • me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component.CalibreComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, CalibreIdentifiable, AcceptsCalibrePlugin, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.Component, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.item.Item, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable
    public class CalibreComponent
extends CalibreItem
implements me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.Component, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    A component, which can be nested to create component trees. The building block of an item.

      • extendBase

        public void extendBase​(CalibreComponent base)
        Makes this component inherit the same:
        • slots
        • systems
        • stats
        as the provided base. Existing fields will be merged, with the new ones taking precedence. All collections involved are deep cloned. This may be an intensive operation.
        Parameters:
        base - The base component.
